An object that records objects as they come into the class, keeps a portion of those objects in memory, and recovers itself when asked.

longToString() - Method in class com.ltsllc.miranda.Message
Return a message in "long" format Long format includes all the information we have on the message; and has the format MESSAGE ID: <UUID of message> STATUS: <status URL> DELIVERY: <delivery URL> CONTENTS: <hex encoded contents>
